archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.6.3g: g) unnecessary sensitive information (e.g. authentication details, comments by developers in HTML or JavaScript and details about the organisation or customer) has been removed from the application code.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
